title: Start
body:
Welcome to Survivor
You can do alot in here
Try to use your gun, press CTRL
Great!
Zombies will try to catch you throughout the game
Now listen,
You have two options: 
[[Quit the game|Leave]]
[[Continue|LearnMore]]

title: Leave
body:
Oh, goodbye!
You'll be back soon!

title: TalkTo
body:
Im all alone
[[Recruit him|Recruit]]
[[Some other time|OtherTime]]
